text:
="preserve">The Aligarh Muslim University (AMU) is a major university in the town of Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, India. It was originally founded by Sir Syed Ahmed Khan in 1875, as the Mohammedan Anglo-Oriental College (better known as MAO College). It became a full university in 1920.
Osman Ali Khan, Asaf Jah VII donated 5 Lakh Indian Rupees in the 1930's towards this University.

annotations.surface_form: Osman Ali Khan, Asaf Jah VII
